mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM GROUPS ORDER BY GROUP_LIKE desc ) WHERE GROUP_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-30 AND CURRENT_DATE AND GROUP_LIKE IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.BOARD_NO, a.CATEGORY_NO, a.TITLE, a.BOARD_DATE, (SELECT /* index(b pk_comm_no) */ COUNT(*) FROM COMM b WHERE b.BOARD_NO = a.BOARD_NO) comm_cnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY CATEGORY_NO ORDER BY a.board_like DESC ) AS NUM FROM BOARD a WHERE a.BOARD_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-30 AND CURRENT_DATE AND a.BOARD_LIKE > 0 ) WHERE NUM <= #{BoaedAmount}
